about_the_game:
Build and decorate your tavern, hire staff, stock your larder, meet the locals, be the boss and run the show! Tavern Keeper 🍻 is a detailed business management simulation, a creative decoration sandbox and a bite-sized interactive story book in one.

This is the second game by indie devs, Greenheart Games 💚 - creators of Game Dev Tycoon - and has been nearly a decade in the making!




Your Role, Should You Accept It


Starting out with a shell of a tavern in the backwaters of the kingdom, you build rooms, place items, stock the store room and hire staff to satisfy the demands of the oddball locals that stumble through your door. Run your business well and progress to larger taverns, expanding your offerings to include new meals, drinks, rooms and services.




Simtastic Details


Today’s situation: Your janitor is sick. A spark from a fireplace lands on just the wrong patch of dirt and starts smouldering. Usually not a problem for your attentive team but half of them were infected in the crowded staff quarters overnight and are bedridden. Orders are piling up and patrons' tempers are getting heated. So is the tavern. Because it’s on fire. Oops, perhaps it’s time to call the fire brigade...

Tavern Keeper is full of simulated details that can combine in unexpected ways. Temperature simulations, varied personality traits and dozens of other systems keep things interesting. But don’t worry, you’ll have the tools to handle any situation.




Trope-Bending Fun


Make your way through a single player campaign across a fantasy world full of eccentric characters. From shape-shifters with imposter syndrome to skeletons in the throes of an after-life crisis, there’s always a surprise around the corner and always someone needing the guidance of a Tavern Keeper like you.




Get Inn-Spired!

If you enjoy building, decorating and creating, Tavern Keeper’s Design Mode is perfect for you!


Whether you just want to place a single candle on a table, or turn a chair into your own extravagant pillow fort, it’s all possible and, with just a few clicks, you can share your creations with others!

Wishlist Now and Follow

💚 We’ll reveal more about the game as we get closer to release. If you want to be the first to see the gameplay trailer or read about feature highlights, make sure to Wishlist and Follow!

short_description: Build and manage your own tavern in this charming fantasy business sim. Dive into every detail or relax and decorate to your heart's desire. Upgrade your tavern and navigate light-hearted tales of unlikely heroes as you play the most important role of all: the Tavern Keeper!

*languages with full audio support
